text: WUBS (89.7 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of South Bend, Indiana. The station is owned by ICU Ministries, Inc., and airs a religious format. The station was assigned the WUBS call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on December 17, 1992. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * UBS Category:Radio stations established in 1993 Category:1993 establishments in Indiana Category:Religious radio stations in the United States Category:St. Joseph County, Indiana
title: WUBS
